issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: WM alter may fail if the name is not changed

Actually, one use case (replace active plan) does rely semantically on the null plan. Looks like local metastore doesn't go thru thrift validation so it works in tests.
The better approach is to make the value nullable.
Attached a patch and an (even smaller than the original :)) patch excluding generated code.
new nogen patch looks good to me. +1
Committed to master. Thanks for the review!
